100: Started a new user register. Waiting for confirmation code to complete the register. The code confirmation was sent by SMS to your number
101: Updating the uncomplete register. Waiting for confirmation code to complete the register. The code confirmation was sent by SMS to your number
105: New user registered successfully. Please, login now.
112: Login done in the new device. Waiting for confirmation code to complete the registration. The code confirmation was sent by SMS to your number
115: Device changed successfully. Please, login now, and contact the support to release the new device.
